I mounted using Virtual Clone Drive. (Windows 7.) I was having similar issues as some of you. After mounting install disc, the setup screen would come up, and after I clicked install, nothing would happen. I gave up after a bit and decided to look up porn, but after a while the setup screen finally came up asking where I wanted to install. Finished the installation after that with no problems, but when I start the game a black screen comes up. At this point I'm gonna try grand1987's suggestion. 
P.S. While on the black screen, I press Esc and the New Game - Continue screen appears. I move the mouse but there is no pointer. (Don't know if you are supposed to see pointer at this point.) If I press the regular Enter key nothing happens, but if I press the Enter key on the number pad I hear an error sound, but still nothing happens. Just extra information, don't know if it matters/helps.

Okay go to : http://www.daemon-tools.cc/eng/downloads
And download DAEMON Tools Lite. Install it, run it and hit the button where it is a picture of a cd room and has white lethers over it: SCSI.
Now hit the CD-button in DAEMON Tools Lite with + over it. You go find the file you want to use and mount it.
Problem solved.
Plz contact me if I'm wrong.

If you're having the black screen problem....

DOWNLOAD THE "TRUEMOTION"CODEC

Its an old codec that was used to play FF7 movies.

the reason you are seeing the black screen,  is the fact that there is a movie that is suppose to be playing,  and your PC doesnt have the codec to actually play it.

google, "True Motion codec Final fantasy 7"  should be the second clickable link.
